Comments.Message:
Description: CA1804 : Microsoft.Performance : 'ThreadExceptionHandler.ApplicationThreadException(object, ThreadExceptionEventArgs)' declares a variable, 'result', of type 'DialogResult', which is never used or is only assigned to. Use this variable or remove it.
